name: Chewbacca, Walking Carpet
Lore: 'Some people think that hokey religions and ancient weapons are no match for a good blaster at your side. Wookiee scoundrel.',
Text: 'Adds 2 to the power of anything he pilots. Adds 2 to maneuver of any starfighter he pilots. Your total ability here may not be reduced. Once per game, may lose 1 force to deploy a droid from Lost Pile. During battle, target a just hit character. Target''s forfeit is restored to normal.',
